help_wifi_wifi_basic.lang_hwb1: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_wifi_wifi_basic.lang_hwb5: Select the wireless standards your network will support.
help_wifi_wifi_basic.lang_hwb7: Enter the name of your wireless network.
help_wifi_wifi_basic.lang_hwb9: Select the radio channel width for your Wireless-N devices.
help_wifi_wifi_basic.lang_hwb11: Select the radio channel that the Router will use.
help_wifi_wifi_basic.lang_hwb13: When wireless devices survey the local area for wireless networks to associate with, they will detect the SSID (wireless network name) broadcast by the Router. To broadcast the Router's SSID, keep the default, Enabled.
help_wifi_wifi_basic.lang_hwb14: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
